duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish a unified data model to support analytics initiatives and build scalable infrastructure for data teams.
Write and optimize complex SQL queries, with preference for Snowflake.
Utilize data visualization tools, with preference for Superset and Looker.
Utilize object-oriented programming, particularly Python, for data engineering tasks.
Work with orchestration systems, with preference for Airflow.
Use GitHub for version control and collaboration in data engineering projects.
Develop and optimize data pipelines and ETL processes, transitioning to dbt where applicable.
Build scalable systems for monitoring, alerting, and automation of data workflows.
Contribute to data governance efforts within the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or related field (Master's degree preferred)
